changelogs.title: B18 Changelog
description: - Fixed white screen during world loading.
- Fixed cape GUI broken on Auto GUI scale.
- Fixed server list button on singleplayer.
- Fixed sprint FOV bypass not working correctly.
+ Cost of cosmetics will now display in cosmetics tab.
+ Optimized item rendering for improved performance [Beta] (Enable in Settings > Improvements).
